decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Site Plan, dated September 2013, Received 24 September 2013, 01-065-02, dated 19/09/13 and 1312/01, dated 18/08/13, Received 24 September 2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - At all times, the level of noise emitted from air conditioning unit on the site shall not exceed a level 10dB below existing background noise levels. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations. The measurements shall be made according to BS4142:1997.
description: Erection of an external air conditioning condenser unit at the rear of the premises.
